page.title: 08Uyeasound Youth Hostel.
page.content: The privately-owned Youth Hostel lies on the Westside of Uyeasound.It is called Gardiesfauld.It is open from April to November but the busiest month is July and the quietest month is April. A man and his wife who live across the road,run the Youth Hostel.They have run it since 1978 when they bought it from the previous owner who ran it from 1972. People come from all over the world to stay,but most visitors are students.30 people can stay at once,some in single rooms,some in larger rooms.There are bath and shower facilities as well as toilets and facilities for cooking.In May 1985 it cost Â£2 per night for adults and 80p for children to stay.Meals are not provided.
